title: Landing Page Animation and Interaction Load
description: Verify that landing page animations including tunnel reveal, interactive subtitle scramble, spotlight cursor, and 3D card tilting operate smoothly and without glitches across supported browsers and devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the portal landing page (index.html) on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
Confirm the tunnel reveal animation plays smoothly on page load without jank or frame drops.
Verify the interactive subtitle scramble text effect animates correctly and updates as expected.
Check that the spotlight cursor effect follows mouse movement fluidly without delay.
Hover over bento grid navigation cards and check 3D card tilting activates properly.
Ensure all animations remain consistent across different screen sizes (375px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px).
Validate that CRT scanlines overlay and starfield background render correctly and do not degrade performance.

title: Newsletter Subscription Email Validation
description: Ensure newsletter subscription form validates user email address format correctly and displays appropriate confirmation or error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page and locate the newsletter subscription form.
Enter a valid email address and submit using the magnetic submit button.
Verify the form accepts the input and shows a confirmation alert.
Enter various invalid email formats (missing '@', missing domain, empty input).
Check that validation rejects invalid inputs and prevents submission.
Confirm that no page reload occurs during validation errors.

title: Navigation Through Thematic World Hubs
description: Validate the navigation from landing page to each of the three thematic world hubs and the visual zoom effect on transition.

steps.description: On the landing page, click on the IA & Futuro card.
Confirm the portal transitions with a zoom effect into the IA & Futuro hub.
Verify the world hub renders correct terminal cyberpunk visuals, status indicators, and article cards with metadata and tags.
Return to the landing page and repeat steps for Espiritualidad hub.
Confirm mystical gold accents, glowing orbs, and rotating mantra messages are present.
Return and navigate to Arte Surrealista hub.
Verify surrealistic pink accents, particle effects, and interactive art galleries including the maze game are available.

title: Article Page Functionality and Visuals
description: Check that interactive article pages load with correct world-themed backgrounds, scroll progress bar, navigation sidebar, blockquotes, related article links, and thematic footer mantras.

steps.description: From each world hub, select an article card to open the article page.
Confirm the background reflects the thematic world's style.
Scroll through the article and verify the scroll progress bar updates accordingly.
Ensure the content navigation sidebar links highlight according to current scroll position.
Check that blockquotes and related article links appear correctly and function as expected.
Verify thematic footer mantras are displayed.
Click related article links and confirm navigation occurs without errors.

title: Laberinto Onírico Maze Interaction and Completion
description: Test interactive maze with 5 hidden easter egg nodes, progress tracking, and completion messaging in Arte Surrealista world.

steps.description: Navigate to Arte Surrealista world hub and access the Laberinto Onírico maze gallery.
Interact with maze nodes to discover hidden easter eggs.
Verify each easter egg node reveals unique content or effect upon interaction.
Confirm progress tracking updates correctly as easter eggs are found.
Complete the maze by finding all easter egg nodes.
Validate that a completion message is displayed at the end of the maze experience.

title: Interactive UI Element Hover and Click Responses
description: Verify all interactive UI elements including hover effects, magnetic buttons, hamburger menu toggle, particle effects, and labyrinth nodes respond correctly to user input.

steps.description: Hover over all navigation cards on landing page and confirm hover animation triggers.
Engage magnetic submit button by moving mouse cursor around and validate the magnetic effect.
Click hamburger menu on mobile viewport to open and close navigation.
Check navigation menu visibility toggles correctly.
Observe particle effects on Arte Surrealista hub for animation consistency.
Hover and click labyrinth nodes within the maze to verify interaction activation.

title: Accessibility Compliance - Keyboard Navigation and Reduced Motion
description: Ensure site supports keyboard navigation and respects user preference for reduced motion according to WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

steps.description: Use keyboard (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space) to navigate through all interactive elements on landing page and world hubs.
Confirm focus indicators are visible and navigation order is logical and complete.
Enable operating system or browser setting for reduced motion.
Verify that animations on landing page and world hubs respect reduced motion preference by minimizing or disabling animations.
Check that all interactive functions remain accessible and usable without motion effects.

title: Cross-Browser and Responsive Layout Rendering
description: Validate consistent rendering and functionality across supported modern browsers and defined responsive layout breakpoints.

steps.description: Open all major pages (index.html, worlds hubs, articles, maze) on Chrome (90+), Firefox (88+), Safari (14+), and Edge (90+).
Confirm that all visual elements, animations, and interactions render correctly and behave as expected.
Resize browser viewport or use device emulators to test breakpoints at 375px, 768px, 1024px, and 1440px widths.
Validate that responsive layouts adjust correctly with no layout breakage or overflow.

title: Performance Metrics Verification
description: Ensure performance targets are met including First Contentful Paint under 1.5 seconds, Time to Interactive under 3 seconds, and Lighthouse performance score above 85.

steps.description: Using Chrome DevTools or Lighthouse, measure performance metrics on loading the landing page.
Verify First Contentful Paint is below 1.5 seconds.
Confirm Time to Interactive is under 3 seconds.
Check Lighthouse performance score is above 85.
Repeat measurements for each thematic world hub page and an article page.
